citations.narrative:
The facility has not developed and documented a contingency plan. A plan is important to be in place in preparation for
unexpected disasters or events, especially when located in a region that encounters inclement weather seasonally. The
contingency plan should include a detailed strategy to address the needed handling, treatment, transportation, housing,
and care of the animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. The facility shall develop and document an appropriate
contingency plan available for review upon USDA inspections.
Correct by September 28, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has not developed and documented a contingency plan. A plan is important to be in place in preparation for 
unexpected disasters or events, especially when located in a region that encounters inclement weather seasonally. The 
contingency plan should include a detailed strategy to address the needed handling, treatment, transportation, housing, 
and care of the animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. The facility shall develop and document an appropriate 
contingency plan available for review upon USDA inspections.  
 
Correct by September 28, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
